price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun bai wa Dãwũda da Sulaimãn ilmi kuma suka ce: "Gõdiya* ta tabbata ga Allah, Wanda Ya fĩfĩta mu a kan mãsu yawa daga bãyin Sa mũminai."
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ عِلۡمٗاۖ وَقَالَا ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٖ مِّنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: * Abin da ke hakkin ni'imar Allah a kan mutum, ya gõde Masa. Dãwũda da Sulaiman Allah Yã bã su ilmi na Annabci sun tsayu da gõdiyarsa a kan aiki da shi, da kuma iƙrãri da cewa nĩ'ima ce daga Allah, bã da wani aiki nãsu ba. Annabci da ilmi da sanin maganar tsuntsu da ta aljannu da taturũruwa duka sunã cikin ashĩrin Allah da Yake nũnãwa ta hanyar waɗansu bãyinsa Annabãwa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā dāwūda wasulaymāna ʿil'man waqālā al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī faḍḍalanā ʿalā kathīrin min ʿibādihi al-mu'minīna
